title: Photosynthesis
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Michael Birch
brief_description: Explains how green plants transform light energy into food by the process of photosynthesis. Shows the process by which carbon dioxide and water - in the presence of light and chlorophyll - react to produce sugar and release oxygen.
description: Explains how green plants transform light energy into food by the process of photosynthesis. Shows the process by which carbon dioxide and water - in the presence of light and chlorophyll - react to produce sugar and release oxygen.
